name: STMT_CONS_SP_ACCT_DETAIL
description: This table contains information about insourced hospital accounts that are associated with a given statement.

columns.name: PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the stmt/det bill record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_PREV_PAT_BAL
columns.description: This stores the patient balance as of the last statement for a received self-pay hospital account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_NEW_CHG_AMT
columns.description: Stores the amount of new charges on a received self-pay account for this statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_NEW_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the amount of new payments on a received self-pay account for this statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_NEW_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Stores the amount of new adjustments on a received self-pay account for this statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_NEW_INS_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the amount of new insurance payments on a received self-pay account for this statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_NEW_INS_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Stores the amount of new insurance adjustments on a received self-pay account for this statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_NEW_PAT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the amount of new patient payments on a received self-pay account for this statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_NEW_PAT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Stores the amount of new patient adjustments on a received self-pay account for this statement.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_TOT_CHG_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total charges for a received self-pay account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_TOT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total payments for a received self-pay account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_TOT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total adjustments for a received self-pay account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_TOT_INS_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total insurance payments for a received self-pay account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_TOT_INS_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total insurance adjustments for a received self-pay account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_TOT_PAT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total patient payments for a received self-pay account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_TOT_PAT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total patient adjustments for a received self-pay account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_CURR_PAT_BAL
columns.description: Stores the current balance for a received self-pay account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_CURR_DUE
columns.description: Stores the current amount due for a received self-pay account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_PREV_INS_BAL
columns.description: This stores the insurance balance as of the last statement for a received self-pay hospital account.

columns.name: CONS_SP_HAR_CURR_INS_BAL
columns.description: This stores the insurance balance of the current statement for a received self-pay hospital account.
